你想说的应该是伦理学里所谓的「超义务」（supererogation）行为，一般而言超义务被视为是高道德的，例如看到路边有人快饿死了…

jx.jx_en_mean: (in the Roman Catholic Church) actions believed to form a reserve fund of merit that can be drawn on by prayer in favour of sinners
jx.jx_cn_mean: （罗马天主教）赎罪行为，祈祷者为罪人行善赎罪

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from late Latin supererogatio(n-), from supererogare 'pay in addition', from super- 'over' + erogare 'pay out'

means.word_mean: 1. an effort above and beyond the call of duty
